AT.name: Mega Man™ 6
AT.description: Das erste jährliche Roboterturnier lief wunderbar – bis der mysteriöse Mr. X die acht besten Roboter entführte, um die Welt zu erobern. Schlüpfe in die Rolle von Mega Man, um ihn aufzuhalten! Mega Man 6 war der letzte Teil der Reihe, der auf dem NES™ veröffentlicht wurde, und feierte einen Riesenerfolg! Kämpfe dich durch die acht neuen Level und besiege den Endgegner, der in jedem Level auf dich lauert, um seine Spezialwaffe zu erlangen. Außerdem ist es möglich, durch den Einsatz von Adaptern den kybernetischen Hund Rush mit Mega Man zu kombinieren: Schwinge dich als Jet Mega Man in die Lüfte oder verpasse deinen Gegnern als Power Mega Man Power-Schläge. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 6
AU.description: The first Annual Robot Tournament was going well – until the mysterious Mr. X took the top eight robots to conquer the world. Enter Mega Man to save the day! Mega Man 6 was the last of the series to be released on NES™, and it goes out with a bang! Battle through eight new stages and defeat the boss in each, to take its power for yourself. Also, adaptors allow Mega Man and cybernetic canine Rush, to combine and become Jet Mega Man or Power Mega Man, to fly and perform power punches. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mega Man™ 6
BG.description: The first Annual Robot Tournament was going well – until the mysterious Mr. X took the top eight robots to conquer the world. Enter Mega Man to save the day! Mega Man 6 was the last of the series to be released on NES™, and it goes out with a bang! Battle through eight new stages and defeat the boss in each, to take its power for yourself. Also, adaptors allow Mega Man and cybernetic canine Rush, to combine and become Jet Mega Man or Power Mega Man, to fly and perform power punches. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mega Man™ 6
BE.description: Le premier tournoi annuel de robots se déroulait à merveille jusqu'à ce que le mystérieux Mr. X ne s'empare des huit meilleurs robots pour conquérir le monde. Heureusement, Mega Man est là pour contrecarrer ses plans ! Mega Man 6 est le dernier épisode de la saga à être sorti sur la NES™ et c'est un vrai chef-d'œuvre ! Menez le combat à travers huit niveaux inédits et éliminez les boss afin de vous emparer de leurs pouvoirs. Enfin, des adaptateurs permettent à Mega Man et à son chien cybernétique, Rush, de se combiner et de se transformer en Jet Mega Man ou en Power Mega Man, leur permettant ainsi de voler et de distribuer des coups de poing surpuissants. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 6
ES.description: El primer Torneo anual de robots marcha bien hasta que el enigmático Sr. X se apodera de los ocho mejores robots para conquistar el mundo. ¡Impedirlo será el deber de Mega Man! Mega Man 6 fue la última entrega de la serie que se publicó para NES™ y, ¡la despedida fue a lo grande! Lucha para abrirte camino por ocho nuevos niveles y vence al jefe que encontrarás en cada uno de ellos para hacerte con sus poderes. Mega Man y su fiel perro cibernético, Rush, podrán combinarse mediante adaptadores para convertirse en Jet Mega Man o Power Mega Man y hacer uso de nuevos poderes como volar o lanzar potentes puñetazos. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mega Man™ 6
IT.description: Durante la prima Competizione Annuale della Cibernetica tutto sembra tranquillo, fino a quando il misterioso Mr. X decide di entrare in scena e impossessarsi degli otto migliori robot della competizione per conquistare il pianeta! Vesti i panni di Mega Man e salva il mondo intero! Mega Man 6 è l'ultimo episodio della serie per NES™ e chiude il ciclo in grande stile! Aiuta il protagonista nella sua missione e fatti strada attraverso otto nuovi livelli, sconfiggi tutti i boss e impossessati dei loro poteri. In questo titolo, potrai unirti al tuo fedele compagno cibernetico Rush e avvalerti di adattatori speciali, che ti permetteranno di trasformarti in Mega Man Jet o Power Mega Man per volare o spazzare via i nemici con dei veri superpugni. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mega Man™ 6
NL.description: Het eerste jaarlijkse robottoernooi liep gesmeerd totdat de mysterieuze Mr. X de beste acht robotten ontfutselt om de wereld te veroveren. Aan Mega Man de taak om hier een stokje voor te steken. Mega Man 6 was de laatste uit de reeks die werd uitgebracht voor de NES™, en is een ware klapper! Vecht je door acht nieuwe levels en versla de eindbazen om hun kracht over te nemen. Verder kun je Mega Man combineren met zijn cybernetische viervoeter Rush en veranderen in Jet Mega Man of Power Mega Man waardoor je kunt vliegen en verwoestende stoten kunt uitdelen. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mega Man™ 6
NZ.description: The first Annual Robot Tournament was going well – until the mysterious Mr. X took the top eight robots to conquer the world. Enter Mega Man to save the day! Mega Man 6 was the last of the series to be released on NES™, and it goes out with a bang! Battle through eight new stages and defeat the boss in each, to take its power for yourself. Also, adaptors allow Mega Man and cybernetic canine Rush, to combine and become Jet Mega Man or Power Mega Man, to fly and perform power punches. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Mega Man™ 6
PL.description: The first Annual Robot Tournament was going well – until the mysterious Mr. X took the top eight robots to conquer the world. Enter Mega Man to save the day! Mega Man 6 was the last of the series to be released on NES™, and it goes out with a bang! Battle through eight new stages and defeat the boss in each, to take its power for yourself. Also, adaptors allow Mega Man and cybernetic canine Rush, to combine and become Jet Mega Man or Power Mega Man, to fly and perform power punches. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 6
PT.description: O primeiro Annual Robot Tournament estava a correr bem, até o misterioso Mr. X se apoderar dos oito melhores robôs para conquistar o mundo. Assume o papel de Mega Man para salvar o dia! Mega Man 6 foi o último da série a ser lançado para a NES™ e teve imenso sucesso! Luta através de oito novos níveis e derrota o vilão em cada um deles para te apropriares dos seus poderes. Para além disso, a utilização de adaptadores permitem que Mega Man e o cão cibernético Rush se juntem e se transformem no Jet Mega Man para conseguir voar, ou no Power Mega Man para desferir murros poderosos. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 6
RU.description: Первый Ежегодный роботурнир удался на славу, если бы не ужасное событие, омрачившее финал: загадочный Mr. X похитил 8 роботов-чемпионов и хочет с их помощью завоевать весь мир. Только Mega Man под силу остановить злодея. Mega Man 6 — последняя игра серии, вышедшая на NES™. Тем не менее, она надолго запомнилась игроманам. Вас ждут восемь новых этапов, а по окончании каждого из них — поединок с боссом. Если вам удастся одолеть противника, его необычайные способности перейдут к вам. Благодаря специальным адапторам Mega Man и его верный киберпес Rush смогут перевоплощаться в Jet Mega Man или Power Mega Man, летать и наносить суперудары. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
